title: 1906 White Sox w/Comiskey, Walsh etc..Postmarked when they won Series!! From IL
author: Leon

posts.post_title: 1906 White Sox w/Comiskey, Walsh etc..Postmarked when they won Series!! From IL
posts.post_content:
1906 White Sox w/Comiskey, Walsh etc...Postmarked the day they won the Series and from Chicago!! Both Chicago teams were in the world series this year.   Postcard is normal postcard size and has some creasing as can be seen (and some that can't be seen). It is actually a bit darker in person than it is on the screen here. Really nice contrast and focus in person too, better than the scanner did. $no longer for sale


Game 6  Sunday, October 14, 1906. Chicago, IL at South Side Park III (Chicago White Sox)

                                 1  2  3    4  5  6    7  8  9     R  H  E
                                 -  -  -    -  -  -    -  -  -     -  -  -
    Chicago Cubs                 1  0  0    0  1  0    0  0  1     3  7  0
    Chicago White Sox            3  4  0    0  0  0    0  1  x     8 14  3

    PITCHERS: CHC - Brown, Overall (2)
              CHW - White

               WP - Doc White
       LP - Mordecai Brown
             SAVE - none

   HOME RUNS: CHC - none
              CHW - none

  ATTENDANCE: 19,249
